1.details:
Set up professional documentation architecture with:
- Technical specifications for each application
- Database schemas and SQL patterns
- API documentation and examples
- Code architecture explanations
- Developer onboarding guides
- Deployment and maintenance procedures

2.details:
Create detailed technical documentation including:
- Application architecture and components
- Database schema and relationships
- API endpoints and authentication
- Business logic and workflows
- UI/UX patterns and components
- Integration points with other apps

3.details:

- Size-specific inventory tracking system
- Product and variant management
- Stock level monitoring and alerts
- Bulk operations and workflows
- Database schema for products/variants
- Real-time update mechanisms

- Wedding management workflows

- Communication systems
